titles.title: As The Eyes Of A Servant

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
As the eyes of a servant look
Unto his master's hand,
As the eyes of a maiden look
To please her mistress.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So my eyes look to You,
My eyes look to You.
Gracious Master, Lord and King,
We serve You wholly.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
At the time when love is tried,
When gold He purifies,
Stand by me, and let me see
His word alive in me.
